summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4660 for the improvement of the alley in block 6, Pettit's University Addition being the alley from East 50th Street to East 52nd Street, between 11th Avenue Northeast and 12th Avenue Northeast, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54089, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
